aboutMe.1: I’m Nicola Valentini, a Web Developer specializing in React, with experience dating back to 2020.
aboutMe.2: I build modern interfaces by turning ideas into responsive and high-performing solutions.
aboutMe.3: I’m currently looking for opportunities in startups where innovation and product quality are a top priority.
aboutMe.4: Let’s connect and see how I can bring value to your team...

whoIAm.1: I’m a Web Developer with a passion for technology and innovation, always looking for new challenges.
whoIAm.2: I design and build modern, fast, user-friendly interfaces — from mockups or even just ideas — that put user experience first.
whoIAm.3: I’ve worked on complex UI projects, including in the banking sector, that required not just clean code, but also attention to UX, scalability, and optimization.
whoIAm.4: My workflow is structured and effective: Analyze – Design – Develop – Optimize. My focus? Functional, responsive, high-performing solutions.

myHistory.1: My passion for programming started in middle school, driven by curiosity to understand how the games and applications we use every day actually work.
myHistory.2: I chose an educational path in computer science, where I learned languages like Java and discovered the developer profession, which eventually became my career.
myHistory.3: Over the years, I’ve put my knowledge into practice, exploring and becoming passionate about new technologies, particularly React.
myHistory.4: Today, I’m focusing on strengthening my server-side development skills with Next.js, and my next goal is to learn mobile development with React Native, to become a well-rounded React Developer.
myHistory.5: To achieve this goal, I keep working on projects that challenge my skills. Take a look at my resume to see how I turn ideas into real solutions.

nextTemplate.name: Next Template
nextTemplate.description: A lightweight starter template for Next.js 16 projects with TypeScript, featuring a pre-configured setup for ESLint, Prettier, and Husky to ensure clean and consistent code

curriculumVitae.name: Curriculum Vitae
curriculumVitae.description: My personal curriculum vitae built with Next.js 16, starting from my own template. It includes Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion animations, and supports multiple languages (Italian and English)
